description:
Live Show Mondays brings you the conclusion of the December live show that featured Tara Lynn Fox, Mellanie Monroe, and co-top Isis Love.
After getting the family off the wall, mom and daughter sit for a second and watch us prepare the next torment. A dual inverted suspension with a combined, shared zipper. We slowly apply each clip: one clip on the mom, one clip on the daughter; both attached by the same string. As one moves the other feels it. We vibrate them to get them ready for the pain, we push both girls together and let go. Their backwards momentum rips the zipper from both their bodies. The result is beautiful as mom and daughter scream together in shared agony. Then make them both cum until the end the day.
title: Tara Lynn Fox, Mellanie Monroe, and Isis Love
